title: tour: This does not adequately tell you the difference between how to declare a slice vs an array
body:
Context: http://tour.golang.org/moretypes/7

When reading the tutorial page on arrays, and then on slices, it is NOT obvious how to declare one vs the other.

To declare an ARRAY, you need to provide a length
To declare a SLICE, you may not provide a length, but you must provide initialized values that end up defining the length.

I had to read this entire article:
http://openmymind.net/The-Minimum-You-Need-To-Know-About-Arrays-And-Slices-In-Go/

to figure out the subtleties of declaring a slice vs declaring an array.
